runs.comm: lovely start and Bangladesh are under way! wide outside off and Tamim rocks on the backfoot and punches it past cover
better line, brings it closer to the batsman, punched back to the bowler
good comeback, Pollock finds the right length, draws Tamim forward, beaten for pace and bounce
flicked over mid-on, Tamim feasts on an overpitched delivery on off stump, uses his wrists
good length outside off, Tamim pushes it to point
beaten, just in the channel outside off and the batsman nearly gets an edge while poking at it
loud appeal and given! full and drifting in on the pads, Nazimuddin shuffles just a touch, tries to work it to the on side, is a little late getting his bat down, strikes him in front of leg stump
bang on target in off and middle, short of a length, Aftab uses his feet and works it to the off side
Ntini gets this one to jag back in, tries to work it to the on side, hit high on the pads
what a cracker! Aftab charges down the track to a good length ball on off and middle and carts it over deep midwicket
another cracker! this time its full on middle, Aftab takes just one pace foward and lofts over long-off this time
Aftab isnt done yet! full on middle and leg, Aftab gets a stride across and lofts over midwicket, just enough to reach the fence, despairing dive

rush of blood but it doesn't pay off, Tamim advances down the track after backing away to the leg side, tries to loft over mid-off but the doesnt get the distance and elevation, Smith runs backwards and takes it easily
wow! good length on middle and leg, Ashraful effortlessly lofts with his wrists over deep square leg, first ball
the Marillier scoop this time! on leg stump, Asharful walks across his stumps and scoops it over short fine-leg
Pollock wins this argument! good length on off stump, Ashraful goes for the loft over the bowler's head, mistimes it, gets a top edge and Smith at mid-on runs to his left and takes it
on leg stump and Aftab works this away in his trademark manner over square leg
fullish, on off and middle, driven along the turf to mid-on, quick single taken
here we go again, short of a length, drifting in, Aftab pulls past short fine-leg, he's off to catch a plane somewhere
fullish on off stump, Aftab gets on his knees and drives uppishly over point, gets close to the boundary on this occasion
pushed to the on side
low full toss, Aftab steps down the track and scoops the ball off the toe edge of the bat, enough timing for the ball to sail over extra cover
pulled with force to midwicket, straight to the fielder
short of a length, thudded in on leg stump from wide of the crease, Shakib gets a glove on it and glances it fine past the keeper who dives to his right
welcome to the crease Mr Morkel! Aftab backs away and sends a fullish delivery on off and middle screaming past cover

Timber! pacy delivery on off stump, curving in, Aftab goes for a hoick across the line, misses it completely and the off stump goes back a few yards, Bangladesh just losing the plot here, someone needs to settle down
good length on off and middle, inside edge on the pads
glided off the open face to point, misfield results in a run
raw pace, skids on to the pads, Morkel appeals, the ball may have missed the leg stump
outside off and cut away confidently past point, the fielder at the deep runs across and saves a run or two
good length on the corridor outside off, pushes towards point
deftly played down with soft hands to the off side, Shakib calls, sets off and makes his ground, the throw at the nonstrikers was too wide
played to the off side
pushed to mid-off, Shakib contemplates a run, takes a few paces forward and gets sent back
short of a length and just a touch wide, Shakib slashes at it and the outside edge flies past gully and towards third man
swing and a miss outside the off stump, risky stroke, foot nowhere near the pitch of the ball
just a touch too wide, allows Shakib to stretch his arm out and slash over point and cover
fullish outside off from round the wicket, Shakib plays a conventional square drive along the lush green turf
good length on off stump, Shakib gets forward and nudges it with soft hands to the off side, takes a quick single
Kapali finally gets the strike, opens the face of the bat and plays uppishly to third man
glided off an open face to third man
raw pace and bounce, van der Wath thuds it in on middle and leg, catches Shakib by surprise, the umpire wasnt too impressed, calls it a wide
pushed towards mid on

superb stuff from JP Duminy! Shakib pushes it to mid-off with soft hands, sets off for a run, Duminy gathers the ball, flings himself forward and flicks it mid-air to the stumps at the non strikers end, Shakib dives but he's a couple of yards too short
outside off and uppishly played towards deep point
beaten! Mortaza pokes at one outside the off stump
rush of blood for Mortaza, short of a length outside off, Mortaza has a wild swish outside off, his feet nowhere to be seen
backs away to the leg side and another wild swish, what's going on here?
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
Philander teases him with a delivery at driveable length outside off, the batsman sticks his bat out and withdraws
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
Mortaza doesn;t let up, steps awaym swings and misses it again, his eyes are elsewhere
this time he makes contact and how! the length is closer to middle, Mortaza swings, the ball gets the meat of the bat and sails over long-on
and again! Mortaza backs away, swings, aims over extra cover and times it well enough to sail over the rope
played away quietly on the frontfoot towards mid-off
pushed towards point
Kapali's in no hurry, short of a length on off stump, no room to cut, played off the backfoot towards point
short of a length on off stump, kapali hops and defends
Free Hit : down leg side, Kapali swings with full force, the ball clips his thigh and just gets past Boucher who gets a glove to it
down the leg side
outside off and slashed hard past point
swings and Mortaza misses again
Short of length, hurtling through the zone outside off stump, play and a miss
slipping down the leg side, Kapali tries to glance it away, instead gets four leg byes. He is not going to complain.
short in lengthm, on the off stump, pushed to extra cover

Stunner from Duminy. Mortaza plays another one of his tennis forehand drives - backing away to the leg-side - and ends up scooping it up over extra cover. Duminy rushes back and dives to hold on to a very difficult chance
length delivery on the off stump line, defended back down the track
dropped by de Villiers. Short and wide, chopped straight to backward point where de Villiers makes a mess of a dolly.
fuller, straighter, driven to mid-off
short in length, pulled limply to midwicket
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to cover
nips in after landing on a length just outside off, punched to extra cover for a single
Full and outside off stump, another wild swing and a miss. Bangladesh players don't like those miserly singles, do they?
short in length, poked to the on side
in the zone outside off, holds its line, pushes inside the line and is beaten
this time he shoulders arms to a delivery going through the corridor outside off
on a length, outside off, Reza stays back to guide it to point
ah! another swing and a miss to a length delivery outside off stump
short and wide, cut hard to de Villiers who makes a fine half-stop, diving to his left
banged in short, climbs above the right shoulder, tries to pull but can't reach it
on the middle stump line, moving in from the off stump line, dabbed to the on side
short in length, homing in on the off stump, guided through backward point
full and down the leg side. Wide called.
length delivery on the off stump, holds up a touch, pushed to the left of mid-off
back of the length, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
short in length, just outside the off stump, stays on the back foot, guided past backward point
again short in length, outside off stump, run down to third man
fuller, around that off stump, tries to drive through the off side but gets an edge down to third man
That's a biggie. Slower one, Reza picks it up early, waits on the ball, thrusts his front foot out and lofts it over long-on.
banged in short this time, climbs chest-high, Reza tries to pull it but is beaten by the pace and instead just mistimes it to midwicket
length delivery, on the off stump, tapped to left of de Villiers at backward point
full in length, just outside the off stump, moves in a touch, driven through the line to cover
drags back the length, kicks up as it holds its line outside the off stump, Kapali tries to force it off the back foot and is beaten

Another one bites the dust. Banged in short, at the body, Kapali swivels ever so slowly and shapes for the pull shot but the ball bursts on quickly, collides with the top edge and lobs up towards de Villiers
short in length, outside the off stump, tries to cut but makes no contact
kicks up from short of length, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
again short in length, a tad outside off stump and that allows Reza to stay adjacent to the line and tap it to third man
slower one, outside off stump, Reza shapes initially to drive through the line, spots the slower pace, waits before tapping it to third man
short in length, above waist-high, on the middle stump line, shuffles across to nudge it to square leg
short and wide, cut and a miss.
bouncer, outside off, Reza tries to upper-cut it but makes no contact
fuller, straighter, on the middle and leg, backs away but he was expecting a shorter one and just pushes this fullish delivery towards mid-off
short-pitched delivery, on the stumps, Rahim opens up his stance and pulls it ungainly, high between long leg and deep midwicket and it lands safely
Reza goes downtown. He clears the front foot  and carves a length delivery over long-on
Six and then out. Again tries to flat bat a short-of-length delivery over the bowler's head, gets a top edge to mid-off where Philanders back pedals to take the catch behind his head.
full in length, driven to cover
on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side
gets off the strike with a push to extra cover
full-pitched on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
full, slower one, slanting away from the batsman who tries to heave it away over the on side and is beaten
full again, around the off stump, driven to mid-off
short in length, on the off stump line, Rahim swat-pulls it high towards deep midwicket where Pollock moves to his left to take a smart catch
bouncer over the leg and middle, ducked under
hits the deck back of length, climbs over the middle stump, tries to swing it across the line but no wood on leather
banged in short, at the body, Razzak tries to fend it off, the ball beats the bat, thuds into the thigh pad and runs down to fine leg
short and on the middle and leg, pulled through square leg
slower one, angling away from Razzak who tries to run it to third man - partly edged, partly steered, through the vacant slip region
yorker gets him. Homing in on the base of the off stump, Razzak has a stab at it but can't prevent the ball from crashing into the off stump. Bangladesh have been restricted to 144
